title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo—CLI and Go library to pull, run, and manage Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc. locally with a built-in model registry and REST/OpenAI-compatible API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python SDK that wraps the Ollama REST API—chat, embed, pull, list, delete models with async support.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain partner package—LLM, chat, embeddings and tool-calling interfaces backed by Ollama.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI (chat, multi-user, RAG, presets) that proxies to any Ollama instance; docker-ready.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and embedding support.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust TUI client that lets you chat, manage models, and view logs from the terminal.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Turn any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot replacement via VS Code extension.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Minimal React chatbot component that talks to Ollama; easy drop-in for Next.js apps.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python template showing RAG with Ollama embeddings, Chroma vector store, and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package—same JS client as ollama-js repo, 40k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-py
summary: Official PyPI package—mirror of ollama-python repo, 200k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 client library with nullable ref types, streaming chat, and DI-friendly setup.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up an Ollama service container with any model baked into CI pipelines.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM summarization and Q&A on your vault notes via Ollama.

title: ollama-ray
summary: Ray Serve integration that horizontally scales Ollama models across GPU nodes.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaTextEmbedder nodes.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks including CPU, NVIDIA, and ROCm variants with persistent volumes.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Python Discord.py bot that adds /ask and /model slash commands powered by your local Ollama instance.
